excerpt: These vegetarian burgers are flavor-packed and perfect for a meatless meal.

instructions.name: Cook Quinoa
instructions: In a medium saucepan, bring the water to a boil.
Add the quinoa, reduce heat to low and simmer for 15-20 minutes until the quinoa is cooked and the water is absorbed.
Remove from heat and let cool.

instructions.name: Make the Patties
instructions: In a large mixing bowl, mash the black beans with a fork or potato masher.
Add cooked quinoa, breadcrumbs, egg, green onions, garlic, cumin, chili powder, salt, and pepper to the bowl.
Form the mixture into 4 patties, each about 1 inch (2.5cm) thick.
Refrigerate the patties for at least 30 minutes to let them firm up.

instructions.name: Cook the Patties
instructions: In a large non-stick skillet over medium-high heat, heat 2 tablespoons of oil.
Add the patties and cook until golden brown, about 4-5 minutes per side.
Assemble the burgers with the buns, patties, lettuce, tomato, and mayonnaise.
